items.sentence: My aunt, who lives in Tokyo, sent me a beautiful blouse.
The population of Shanghai is as large as that of Tokyo.
No one knows just how many people died in the avalanche.
I guess the party's over. There's nothing left to drink.
Tom took something out of his bag and handed it to Mary.
How are you going to spend such a large amount of money?
Time passes quickly when we are doing something we like.
Most people think computers will never be able to think.
Please forgive me for not having written to you earlier.
I always think of my father when I look at this picture.
